Apisaloma Timoti, Angelo Thomen jailed for manslaughter of Brian James in Mt Roskill, Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/apisaloma-timoti-angelo-thomen-jailed-for-manslaughter-of-brian-james-in-mt-roskill-auckland/JK6V2M6S4RF7XH44QUWAFYWWQE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/apisaloma-timoti-angelo-thomen-jailed-for-manslaughter-of-brian-james-in-mt-roskill-auckland/JK6V2M6S4RF7XH44QUWAFYWWQE/ Craig KapitanBarber Brian James was shot to death during a tussle for a gun in a pitch-black bedroom. Fri, 14 Jun 2024 02:27:48 +0000 Three men initially charged with the murder of Brian James in Mt Roskill two days before Christmas in 2021 are (from left): Apisaloma Timoti, Angelo Junior Thomsen and Robin Leota. Timoti and Thomsen were instead found guilty of manslaughter and Leota's murder charge was dismissed. Photos / George Block
